title: Recklessly Ever After
description: Gavin St. JamesAfter the hell I've been through in the Marines--in life--there's nothing I crave more than routine, stability, peace. Until McKenna Brewer walks into my life.She's impulsive, fiery, tempting as hell, and everything I don't need. But when she offers me a night of no-strings-attached passion, I can't resist.When our night together has unexpected consequences, I can't help but think this might be the perfect opportunity to show McKenna just how much I want her.The only problem? She doesn't do forevers. But forever is exactly what I need with her.Reckless Hearts Series:  Reckless Hearts (Book 1) The Right Kind of Reckless (Book 2)Recklessly Ever After (Book 3)
author: Heather Van Fleet
